short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks your average Gmail reply time and sends estimated response time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ReplyTime is a productivity tool designed for Gmail users who want to improve response times and set clear expectations for email replies. This Chrome extension tracks how long you take to respond to emails, calculates your average reply time, and automatically sends a customised message to new emails with an estimated response time.

Key Features:

Reply Time Tracking: Calculates the time you take to respond to emails and keeps a rolling average for accurate estimation.
Automated Response: Sends a friendly, pre-set email with your estimated response time, ensuring contacts know when to expect your reply.
Seamless Integration: Built to work directly within Gmail, requiring no additional software.
Privacy-First: Uses secure access to track times and respond only as authorised.
Perfect for professionals who want to manage inbox expectations and reduce follow-up emails.
